translations: v．使安静，使平静：使声音变小或消失，使情绪或活动减弱。
· The noise quietens down after midnight.

sentences.sentence: A silencer quietens the noise of the engine.
sentences.translation: 消声器把发动机的噪音消弭了。

sentences.sentence: And in most cases the captive gradually quietens down and begins to accept its food.
sentences.translation: 在大多数情况下，刚博来的象会慢慢静下来，接着开始吃食。

sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, the time when one quietens down and thinks back, one would miss the cozy racket that used to be so annoying.
sentences.translation: 可是，一个人安静下来时会觉得，曾经厌烦的那些嘈杂回想起来很温情很怀念。
